name: Nagios XI Enumeration
author: Cale Smith
description:
NagiosXI may store credentials of the hosts it monitors. This module extracts these credentials,
          creating opportunities for lateral movement.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: FileDropperDelay
options.description: Delay in seconds before attempting cleanup

options.name: DB_ROOT_PWD
options.description: Password for DB root user, an option if they change this
